import React from 'react'
import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form'
import { Container, Row, Column } from './styles'
import { maskMoney } from '../../components/MaksMoney'

interface IFormInput {
  salarioMensal: number
  percentualAporte: number
  aporteMensal: number
  rendaRestante: number
}

const FormCalc: React.FC = () => {
  const {
    control,
    handleSubmit,
    register,
    setValue,
    errors,
    getValues
  } = useForm<IFormInput>()

  const onSubmit = (data: IFormInput) => {
    console.log(data)
  }

  function calcAporteMensal() {
    const salarioMensal = getValues('salarioMensal')
      .toString()
      .replace('.', '')
      .replace(',', '.')
    const percentualAporte = parseInt(getValues('percentualAporte')) / 100
    const aporteMensal = percentualAporte * parseFloat(salarioMensal) * 100

    if (aporteMensal) {
      setValue('aporteMensal', maskMoney(aporteMensal.toString()))
      const rendaRestante =
        parseFloat(salarioMensal) - parseFloat(aporteMensal)
      setValue('rendaRestante', maskMoney(rendaRestante.toString()))
    } else {
      setValue('aporteMensal', maskMoney('000'))
      setValue('rendaRestante', maskMoney('000'))
    }
  }

  function onChangeRemunaration(e) {
    setValue('salarioMensal', maskMoney(e.target.value))
    calcAporteMensal()
  }

  function onChangeLimpar() {
    setValue('salarioMensal', undefined)
    setValue('percentualAporte', undefined)
    setValue('aporteMensal', undefined)
    setValue('rendaRestante', undefined)
  }

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
      <Container>
        <Row>
          <Column>
            <label>Sal√°rio Mensal</label>
            <input
              placeholder="R$ 0,00"
              className={errors.salarioMensal && 'inpt-error'}
              type="text"
              name="salarioMensal"
              onChange={onChangeRemunaration}
              ref={register({ required: true })}
            />
          </Column>
          <Column>
            <label>Percentual de Aporte</label>
            <input
              placeholder="100%"
              maxLength="3"
              className={errors.percentualAporte && 'inpt-error'}
              type="text"
              name="percentualAporte"
              onChange={calcAporteMensal}
              ref={register({ required: true, maxLength: 3 })}
            />
          </Column>
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Column>
            <label>Aporte Mensal</label>
            <input
              type="text"
              name="aporteMensal"
              ref={register()}
              placeholder="R$ 0,00"
              disabled
              style={{ color: '#fff' }}
            />
          </Column>
          <Column>
            <label>Renda Restante</label>
            <input
              placeholder="R$ 0,00"
              type="text"
              name="rendaRestante"
              ref={register()}
              disabled
              style={{ color: '#fff' }}
            />
          </Column>
        </Row>
        <input type="submit" value="Calcular" />
        <input type="button" value="Limpar" onClick={onChangeLimpar} />
      </Container>
    </form>
  )
}

export default FormCalc
